name: Stomp
description:
V 0.0.0.0.0.11

Stomp is a frantic fighting game / realtime deckbuilder for two players, inspired by games like Dominion and Star Realms.

Characters drop from the container at the top, use these characters to earn money and kill the opponent. Buy more characters (with more advanced abilities) in the randomized store. Characters that you buy go to the discard pile. When your container is empty it will suck up the contents of the discard pile and start over. When a round is over the money will reset.

You can also upgrade your characters which will make them better at their job.

This game is very much under development but feel free to try it out and tell me what you think in the forums.

Cheers,
Erik
